DashboardDefinitionComponents.Parameters:
[{"WidgetSubTitle":"","WidgetType":"grid","WidgetFilterField":"","WidgetColor":"","WidgetXPosition":0,"WidgetYPosition":0,"WidgetRows":24,"WidgetColumns":48,"WidgetHeader":{"showTitle":false,"showSubTitle":false,"WidgetMetrics":{"visible":false,"Metrics":[]},"WidgetPeriodChooser":{"visible":false,"type":"","startDate":null,"endDate":null}},"WidgetDataSources":{"main":{"type":"querytext","value":"select 
	p.Oid, 
	ws.Name as 'Stage', 
	isnull(ws.Color, wst.Color) as Color, 
	p.Name as 'Title', 
	p.Number, 
	u.Name as 'Owner', 
	u.Oid as 'UserId', 
	c.Name as 'Client',
	c.Oid as 'ClientOid',
	p.BeginDate, 
	p.EndDate 
from 
	Project p, [User] u, CommercialClient c, WorkflowState ws, WorkflowStateType wst
where 
	p.ProjectOwner = u.Oid AND p.Client = c.Oid AND ws.Oid = p.WorkflowState AND wst.Oid = ws.WorkflowStateType

","mapping":""}},"Filters":{},"QueryConfiguration":{"PreviousPeriod":{"Show":false,"KeyFieldName":"","Type":0},"RequiredFilters":[]}}]
DashboardDefinitionComponents.Configuration: {"height":"100%","onRowClick":"function(e){if(e.rowType=='data') SkillsWorkflow.genericPreview(e.key.Oid, 'Project.Name', 'project');}","selection":{"mode":"multiple"},"onToolbarPreparing":"function(e) {         e.toolbarOptions.items.unshift({             location: 'after',             template: 'toggleHeaderFilterButtonTemplate'    });                var dataGrid = e.component;          e.toolbarOptions.items.unshift({             location: 'after',             widget: 'dxButton',             options: { icon: 'fas fa-hammer', onClick: function() {                SkillsWorkflow.genericBulk('project', dataGrid);            }        }    })}","columnMinWidth":"50","allowColumnReordering":"true","allowColumnResizing":"true","columns":[{"dataField":"Stage","caption":"Stage","name":"Name","alignment":"left","width":80,"groupCellTemplate":"function(e, i) {            var color=i.component.option().dataSource.find(row=>row.Stage==i.text).Color;            var h=document.createElement('span');            h.style.backgroundColor = color;             h.classList.add('documentStageColor');            e.append(h);            h=document.createElement('span');            var ht=' ' + i.text + ' ('+i.summaryItems[            0        ].value+')';             h.innerHTML = ht;            e.append(h);        }","groupIndex":0},{"dataField":"Title","name":"Title","caption":"Title","alignment":"left"},{"dataField":"Number","caption":"Number","alignment":"left"},{"dataField":"UserId","caption":"Owner","alignment":"left","width":100,"cellTemplate":"function(e, i) { SW.showImage(e, 'user', 'small', true, i.data.Owner, i.data.UserId); }"},{"dataField":"Client","caption":"Client","alignment":"left"},{"dataField":"BeginDate","caption":"Start date","alignment":"right","dataType":"date","format":"dd/MMM/yyyy"},{"dataField":"EndDate","caption":"End date","alignment":"right","dataType":"date","format":"dd/MMM/yyyy"}],"summary":{"groupItems":[{"column":"Title","summaryType":"count","displayFormat":"{0}","alignment":"left"}]},"entity":"project"}
